creator: ryo_sode@filemaker.com
text:
For example, something like this:
Set-Cookie: ryo=sode; Domain=ryosode.com; Expires=Thu, 29-Apr-2004 21:35:08 GMT;
Path=mytest
is ignored. I believe this set-cookie header works fine with standard browsers.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: Cookies are only stored if a Cookie Manager is added to the test plan
